snippet: The football players of a Miami high school know Luther Campbell more as a coach teaching them to be young men than as a rapper with 2 Live Crew who once challenged obscenity laws.
abstract: Profile of Luther Campbell, former frontman of hip-hop group 2 Live Crew who is now football coach at Northwestern High School in Miami; Campbell is no stranger to courtroom battles over his group's explicit lyrics in 1980s, but he has a different message for young players he is helping to mold.
lead_paragraph: The football players of a Miami high school know Luther Campbell more as a coach teaching them to be young men than as a rapper with 2 Live Crew who once challenged obscenity laws.

headline.seo: Luther Campbell Has a New Gig, and a New Rap for His Players
headline.main: Former Hip-Hop Artist’s Defense Never Rests
